text: Salvatore Vincent Pizzo is an American scientist, currently Distinguished Professor of Pathology at Duke University Medical Center and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:21st-century American biologists Category:Duke University faculty Category:American pathologists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Salvatore Pizzo
